comment.author: 27343973@N06
comment._content: Ok, so he has a short leg. I get that but whats going on with his privates? I dont mean to come off as immature but that is more disturbing than his leg. Is this just some illusion due to the photographic process back then?

comment.author: 8525129@N04
comment._content: The more familiar modern genitals we're used to seeing weren't invented until 1899.  What you're seeing is just an old steam-driven penis.
